name: Greedy Frogs
description:
Everyone knows that frogs always hungry. And each time, even sitting on the ground, they are trying to catch some fly. Greedy frog always small. And even after going to the finish line, she did not calm down until he eat all the flies in each level. And if not properly calculate the trajectory of the jump, the frog will absorb the strong waves. Well, try to feed their greedy frog and pass all the levels? Then go ahead, the game started! Greedy Frog will not let you get bored!
Download Greedy Frog for your phone or tablet!

- Greedy Frog - very simple to learn, but rather hardcore game.
- Greedy Frog - real entertainment for both adults and children alike.
